data.name: UnusualProportionsMessage
data.value: Your screen has unusual proportions, its width is not greater than height. Correct work of plugin is not guaranteed.

data.name: ConfigIsNewerThanSupported
data.value: Version of configuration file is higher than supported.

data.name: FailedToCreateConfigFolder
data.value: Failed to create the config folder. Reason:

data.name: FailedToDeserializePlugin
data.value: Failed to deserialize config file even though it has correct version. Default configuration will be used. Reason:

data.name: ErrorOnCoverImageSearch
data.value: An error occured during searching for a cover art image:

data.name: Settings_ShiftDescription
data.value: The window takes square proportions and keeps them.

data.name: Settings_AltDescription
data.value: The window takes proportions of the currently displayed picture.

data.name: Settings_CtrlDescription
data.value: The window keeps its current proportions.
